abstract: Two former executives at Westar Energy, David C. Wittig and Douglas T. Lake, will face trial for a third time on criminal charges that accuse them of trying to loot the utility, a federal prosecutor said Monday.
lead_paragraph: Two former executives at Westar Energy, David C. Wittig and Douglas T. Lake, will face trial for a third time on criminal charges that accuse them of trying to loot the utility, a federal prosecutor said Monday.

headline.main: Ex-Westar Executives to Face a Third Trial
